info.name: MetaFilter Semi-professional
info.description: This was made for Old MeFi. Don't use this with Modern MeFi. A restyling of MetaFilter (including the subsites), somewhere between the regular and the professional white.
info.additionalInfo: This is a work in progress. Front pages for some subsites are ok, others not so much (f.i. irl, jobs). Many pages still need a significant amount of work.
